com.logisima.javagit.cli.rm
Class GitRmOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.logisima.javagit.cli.rm.GitRmOptions

public class GitRmOptions
extends Object

A class to manage passing arguments to the GitRm command. GitRm deletes the indicated files/folders from the git repository.

Note: the --ignore-unmatch option is not included becuase it does not make sense in this setting.

          Construct a GitResetOptions instance with the default values.

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(Object o)
Overrides:

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Overrides:
hashCode in class Object

isOptCached

public boolean isOptCached()
Indicates if rm should just unstage and remove paths only from the index while leaving the working tree files alone.

Returns:
True indicates that rm should just unstage and remove paths only from the index while leaving the working tree files alone. False indicates rm should also effect the working tree files (normal operation).

isOptF

public boolean isOptF()
Indicates whether or not to override the up-to-date check.

Returns:
True indicates to override the up-to-date check. False indicates not to override the up-to-date check.

isOptN

public boolean isOptN()
Indicates if this should be a dry-run; i.e. run GitRm without making any changes on the disk.

Returns:
True if rm should run without making changes to the disk. False if rm should save its changes to disk (normal operation).

isOptQ

public boolean isOptQ()
Is the rm to perform quietly?

Returns:
True if the rm is to perform quietly. False if the rm is to perform as normal.

isOptR

public boolean isOptR()
Should rm run recursively down the specified working tree paths removing all files from the repository?

Returns:
True indicates to recursively remove all files from the repository for all paths specified to GitRm. False indicates to only remove the exact files specified to GitRm.

setOptCached

public void setOptCached(boolean optCached)
Sets whether rm should unstage and remove the paths from the index without effecting the working tree files or if rm should also effect the working tree files.

Parameters:
optCached - True indicates rm should unstage and remove the paths from the index without effecting the working tree files. False indicates rm should also effect the working tree files.

setOptF

public void setOptF(boolean optF)
Set whether rm should override the up-to-date check.

Parameters:
optF - True indicates to override the up-to-date check. False indicates not to override the up-to-date check.

setOptN

public void setOptN(boolean optN)
Sets whether rm should save save its changes to disk.

Parameters:
optN - True if rm should run without making changes to the disk. False if rm should save its changes to disk (normal operation).

setOptQ

public void setOptQ(boolean optQ)
Set the rm to perform quietly or with normal progress information.

Parameters:
optQ - True if the rm is to perform quietly. False if the rm is to perform as normal.

setOptR

public void setOptR(boolean optR)
Set whether rm should recursively delete all files under the specified paths.

Parameters:
optR - True indicates to recursively remove all files from the repository for all paths specified to GitRm. False indicates to only remove the exact files specified to GitRm.
